summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons (BOP) training authorization and related acknowledgment forms for an employee named Tova Noel. It authorizes her attendance at the 'Introduction to Correctional Techniques' course at the Federal Law Enforcement Training Center (FLETC) in Glynco, Georgia, from August 28 to September 14, 2018. The file includes standard BOP policy acknowledgments on conduct, drug testing, and firearms.
